name: Vintage Syracuse University Carmelo Anthony Basketball Jersey
description:
Condition: Mint
Our Measurements: 42 chest, 30 length

Team: Syracuse Orange Men's Basketball

Player: Carmelo Anthony

Anthony spent only one year at Syracuse before being drafted into the NBA in 2003, in one of the greatest line-ups in NBA draft history. The fact 'Melo' spent only one year at Syracuse makes this jersey all the more unusual. This is our current favourite jersey here at ThrowBackz, we love it so much we contemplated not selling it and keeping it for ourselves, so snap it up quick before we change our minds!

name: Vintage Phoenix Suns Barkley Basketball Jersey
description:
Condition: Good. General wear plus a few white marks on the jersey, these can be seen in the pictures.
Our Measurements: 44 chest, 30 length

Team: Phoenix Suns

Player: Charles Barkley

This is THE classic Suns jersey with the name of a true great on the back, we are lucky to have got our hands on one of these! Barkley is not only a Suns legend, winning MVP whilst in Phoenix, he was also part of the original USA dream team that won the 1992 olympics, and is a hall of famer. He also has possibly the most unorthodox golf swing ever seen, seriously, youtube it! Barkley was with the Suns from 1992-1996, making this jersey over 15 years old!

name: Vintage Cleveland Cavaliers Lebron James Basketball Jersey
description:
Condition: Good. General signs of wear, small mark on front of jersey. 
Our Measurements: 46 chest, 33 length

Team: Cleveland Cavaliers

Player: Lebron James

A must have jersey for any Lebron fans, a must not have jersey for any Cleveland fans. James was first pick in the 2003 NBA draft for the Cavs and 2x MVP before infamously moving to Miami in 2010 to the dismay of many Cavs fans.
